FuncDef: The dir command displays the list of directories and files in the specified directory of the remote machine. The dir command displays the list of directories and files in the specified directory of the remote machine. By default, the details about the current directory are displayed.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the remote directory name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters without a blank space.

Specifies the saved local file name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters without a blank space.

ExtraInfo: You can run the dir command to query files in a specified directory on the SFTP server. After the local-filename parameter is set, the file content can be saved to a local file.
